mapper.insert: insert into sm_order (id, uid, gid, bid, count, date_uid) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{uid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{gid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{bid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dateUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update sm_order set uid = #{uid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, gid = #{gid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, bid = #{bid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, count = #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER}, date_uid = #{dateUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, uid, gid, bid, count, date_uid from sm_order
